Verses: 1 idho, Pelisdhar Kekilaavinmel Yuththampanni, Kalanjiyangalaik Kollaiyitukiraarkal Endru Thaaveedhukku Arivikkappattadhu.

2 appozhudhu Thaaveedhu: Naan Poi, Andhap Pelisdharai Muriya Atikkalaamaa Endru Karththaritaththil Visaariththadharku, Karththar: Nee Po; Pelisdharai Muriya Atiththu, Kekilaavai Ratchippaayaaka Endru Thaaveedhukkuch Chonnaar.

3 aanaalum Thaaveedhin Manushar Avanai Nokki: Idho, Naangal Inge Yoodhaavile Irukkumpodhe Payappatukirom; Naangal Pelisdharutaiya Senaikalai Edhirkkiradharku Kekilaavukkup Ponaal, Evvalavu Adhikam Endraarkal.
4 appozhudhu Thaaveedhu Thirumpavum Karththaritaththil Visaariththapodhu, Karththar Avanukku Uththaramaaka: Nee Ezhumpi, Kekilaavukkup Po; Naan Pelisdharai Un Kaiyil Oppukkotuppen Endraar.

5 appatiye Thaaveedhu Than Manusharaik Koottikkontu, Kekilaavukkup Poi, Pelisdharotu Yuththampanni, Avarkalil Anekamperai Vetti, Avarkal Aatumaatukalai Ottikkontuponaan; Ivvidhamaai Kekilaavin Kutikalai Ratchiththaan.
6 akimelekkin Kumaaranaakiya Apiyaththaar Kekilaavil Irukkira Thaaveedhinitaththil Thappiyotukirapodhu, Avanitaththil Oru Epoththu Irundhadhu.

7 thaaveedhu Kekilaavukku Vandhaan Endru Savulukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Thevan Avanai En Kaiyil Oppukkotuththaar; Avan Kadhavukalum Thaazhppaalkalumulla Pattanaththirkul Piravesiththadhinaal, Ataipattirukkiraan Endru Savul Solli,
8 thaaveedhaiyum Avan Manusharaiyum Mutrikkai Potumpatikku, Kekilaavukkup Poka, Ellaa Janaththaiyum Yuththaththirku Azhaippiththaan.
9 thanakkup Pollaappuch Cheyyach Chavul Eththanampannukiraan Endru Thaaveedhu Arindhukontapodhu, Aasaariyanaakiya Apiyaththaarai Nokki: Epoththai Inge Kontuvaa Endraan.

10 appozhudhu Thaaveedhu: Isravelin Thevanaakiya Karththaave, Savul Kekilaavukku Vandhu, Ennimiththam Pattanaththai Azhikka Vakaidhetukiraan Endru Umadhu Atiyaanaakiya Naan Nichchayamaaik Kelvippatten.

11 kekilaa Pattanaththaar Ennai Avan Kaiyil Oppukkotuppaarkalo, Ummutaiya Atiyaan Kelvippattapati Savul Varuvaano, Isravelin Thevanaakiyakarththaave, Idhai Ummutaiya Atiyaanukkuth Therivikkaventum Endraan. Adharkuk Karththar: Avan Varuvaan Endraar.
12 kekilaapattanaththaar Ennaiyum En Manusharaiyum Savulin Kaiyil Oppukkotuppaarkalo Endru Thaaveedhu Kettadharku, Karththar: Oppukkotuppaarkal Endraar.

13 aakaiyaal Thaaveedhum Erakkuraiya Arunooruperaakiya Avan Manusharum Ezhumpi, Kekilaavai Vittup Purappattu, Pokakkootiya Itaththirkup Ponaarkal; Thaaveedhu Kekilaavilirundhu Thappipponaan Endru Savulukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Thaan Purappatukiradhai Niruththi Vittaan.

14 thaaveedhu Vanaandharaththilulla Aranaana Sdhalangalile Thangi, Seep Ennum Vanaandharaththilirukkira Oru Malaiyile Thariththirundhaan; Savul Anudhinamum Avanaith Thetiyum, Thevan Avanai Avan Kaiyil Oppukkotukkavillai.
15 than Piraananai Vaangath Thetumpatikku, Savul Purappattaan Endru Thaaveedhu Arindhapatiyinaale, Thaaveedhu Seep Vanaandharaththilulla Oru Kaattile Irundhaan.
16 appozhudhu Savulin Kumaaranaakiya Yonaththaan Ezhundhu, Kaattilirukkira Thaaveedhinitaththil Poi, Thevanukkul Avan Kaiyaith Thitappatuththi:

17 neer Payappataventaam; En Thakappanaakiya Savulin Kai Ummaik Kantu Pitikkamaattaadhu; Neer Isravelinmel Raajaavaayiruppeer; Appozhudhu Naan Umakku Irantaavadhaayiruppen; Appati Natakkum Endru En Thakappanaakiya Savulum Arindhirukkiraar Endraan.
18 avarkal Iruvarum Karththarukku Munpaaka Utanpatikkai Panninapinpu, Thaaveedhu Kaattil Irundhuvittaan; Yonaththaano Than Veettirkup Ponaan.
19 pinpu Seep Ooraar Kipiyaavilirukkira Savulitaththil Vandhu: Thaaveedhu Engalitaththil Eshimonukkuth Therke Aakilaa Ennum Malaikkaattilulla Aranippaana Itangalil Oliththukkontirukkiraan Allavaa?
20 ippodhum Raajaave, Neer Ummutaiya Manaviruppaththinpati Irangivaarum; Avanai Raajaavin Kaiyil Oppukkotukka, Engalaal Aakum Endraarkal.
21 adharku Savul: Neengal Enmel Thayai Vaiththadhinaale, Karththaraal Aaseervadhikkappattiruppeerkalaaka.
22 neengal Poi, Avan Kaal Natamaatukira Itaththaip Paarththu, Ange Avanaik Kantavan Yaar Enpadhaiyum Innum Nandraai Visaariththu Ariyungal; Avan Makaa Thandhiravaadhi Endru Enakkuth Theriyavandhadhu.

23 avan Oliththukkontirukkum Ellaa Maraivitangalaiyum Paarththarindhu Kontu, Nichchaya Seydhi Enakkuk Kontuvaarungal; Appozhudhu Naan Ungalote Kootavandhu, Avan Thesaththil Irundhaal, Yoodhaavilirukkira Sakala Aayirangalukkullum Avanaith Thetip Poven Endraan.
24 appozhudhu Avarkal Ezhundhu, Savulukku Munnaale Seep Oorukkup Ponaarkal; Thaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Eshimonukkuth Therkaana Andhara Veliyaakiya Maakon Vanaandharaththil Irundhaarkal.

25 savulum Avan Manusharum Thaaveedhaith Thetavarukiraarkal Endru Avanukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Avan Kanmalaiyilirundhu Irangi, Maakon Vanaandharaththile Thanginaan; Adhai Savul Kelvippattu, Maakon Vanaandharaththile Thaaveedhaip Pin Thotarndhaan.

26 savul Malaiyin Indhappakkaththilum, Thaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Malaiyin Andhappakkaththilum Natandhaarkal; Savulukkuth Thappippoka, Thaaveedhu Theeviriththapodhu, Savulum Avan Manusharum Thaaveedhaiyum Avan Manusharaiyum Pitikkath Thakkadhaai Avarkalai Valaindhukontaarkal.
27 andhach Chamayaththil Oru Aal Savulitaththil Vandhu: Neer Seekkiramaai Vaarum; Pelisdhar Thesaththinmel Pataiyetuththu Vandhirukkiraarkal Endraan.
28 adhanaal Savul Thaaveedhaip Pin Thotarukiradhai Vittuth Thirumpi, Pelisdharai Edhirkkumpati Ponaan; Aadhalaal Avvitaththirkuch Chelaa Ammaalikodh Endru Perittaarkal.
29 thaaveedhu Avvitaththai Vittup Purappattu, Enkedhiyilulla Aranippaana Itangalil Thanginaan.
